powerup_0.title: Explosion
powerup_0.description: Creates an explosion that blows-up every vehicle within its radius.

powerup_1.title: Invisibility
powerup_1.description: You are invisible for all players during 10 seconds.

powerup_2.title: Random Mayhem
powerup_2.description: Targets 3 random players with a beam that makes them bumping.

powerup_3.title: Random Mayhem
powerup_3.description: Creates a shield around your vehicle, protecting you from any damage during 10 seconds.

powerup_4.title: Front Beam
powerup_4.description: Triggers a beam in front of your vehicle, that will make all aimed vehicles bump.
